testcase.name: Test Case 13
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks on 'Products' button to see products.......................passed Then User click 'View Product' for any product on home page.................passed Then Verify product detail is opened........................................passed Then User increases quantity to 4...........................................passed Then User clicks Add to cart button to add cart............................passed Then User click 'View Cart' button..........................................passed Then Verify that product is displayed in cart page..........................passed
